news_header: Trump believes Russia holds an advantage in Ukraine peace talks due to territorial gains.
news_original_title: Trump tells BBC that Russia has 'the cards' in peace negotiations
news_text: Donald Trump stated that Russia has the upper hand in peace talks regarding Ukraine due to their territorial gains. He expressed trust that Russia wants to end the war, despite his criticism of Ukrainian President Zelensky, whom he labeled a 'dictator.' Trump's comments followed a meeting where he discussed US-Russia relations, and he faced backlash for undermining Zelensky's legitimacy.
